column1: Visitation will be held on Monday
column3: 2015 from 6-8 p.m. at the JACKSON LYTLE & LEWIS FUNERAL HOME- Springfield. A celebration of Leeda's life will be held on Tuesday
column5: 2015 at 1 p.m. with Pastor Dave Hill officiating
column6: at Northside Baptist Church. Entombment to follow at Rose Hill Burial Park.
